title: Added support for Index Options India and updated 2024 holiday list for Equity, Index, Option and Futures
body:
Added support for Index Options India and updated 2024 holiday list for Equity, Index, Option and Futures.




#### Description
Holiday list in Lean market data does not cover all market holiday for year 2024. Also, it does not provide data about Index Options India, unlike Index Options US. 

#### Related Issue
https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues/6908

#### Motivation and Context
We use lean-cli daily, and I need to manually update same information of holidays in the related file each time.

#### Requires Documentation Change
No



#### Types of changes

Hey @jaredbroad, I appreciate your concern. It seems there are few confusions.  I had only added the holidays for 2024. Rest information remains same as the original code. 
These dates are taken from official website of NSE, India (national stock market). Same can be verified by visiting [NSE official site](https://www.nseindia.com/resources/exchange-communication-holidays)
It seems Gemini is unable to identify them. but, these are listed on official website. Requesting for merger of this PR.
